title.zh: 武汉：2025华中区第二届血友病合作交流会
title.en: Wuhan: 2025 2nd Central China Hemophilia Cooperation and Exchange Conference

subtitle.en: Multi-provincial and Municipal Organization Empowerment Conference

description.zh: 2025华中区第二届血友病合作交流会暨多省市组织赋能会在武汉举行。左钰洁以“关爱女性血友病患者 国内外最新进展”为题，展开公益科普宣讲，分享国内外在女性血友病患者关爱领域的最新研究进展和实践经验。
description.en: The 2nd Central China Hemophilia Cooperation and Exchange Conference and Multi-provincial and Municipal Organization Empowerment Conference 2025 was held in Wuhan. Yujie (Ruby) Zuo gave a public welfare science lecture titled 'Caring for Women with Hemophilia: Latest Domestic and International Progress', sharing the latest research progress and practical experience in the field of women with hemophilia care both domestically and internationally.
